interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MRTREUP Elastic Bands For Wig 3Pcs Lace Melting Band Edge Band For Lace Front Wig, Hair Edge Wrap To Lay Edges , Edge Brush For Baby Hair Adjustable Wig Band Rail Tail Comb For Braided(Silver)
Review Date: 2022/08/30
Store: MRTREUP
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Color': 'Silver', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Baby', 'Material': 'Latex', 'Fabric Type': 'lace', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 1.3 x 2 inches; 1.76 Ounces'}
Review Text: These elastic bands are stretchy, comfy and stylish! I can definitely rock one of these elastic bands as a headband with all the bling and the comfortable elasticity. But my primary use for the bands are to lay & slay my edges! Also, the edge brush & rat tail comb are essential to parting & molding my baby hairs as well. This wig band set is a great addition to my hair styling tools.
Review Title: “SLAY” Bands!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
ZILING Straight Lace Front Wigs Human Hair 4x4 Lace Closure Wigs for Black Women Pre Plucked 150% Density Brazilian Straight Lace Front Closure Wigs Human Hair 18 Inch ZILING {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Tangle Free', 'Brand': 'ZILING', 'Package Dimensions': '11.34 x 9.06 x 2.48 inches; 6 Ounces'} The hair is soft and layered so it feels more like 130 density. It measured longer than 18” but it has short hairs throughout as shown in the photos. The lace is more of a light brown with small knots and the hairline is pre-plucked. The cap is well constructed and it’s small head friendly (circumferences less than 22”). Overall, it’s soft with a silky straight texture but the density is just too thin for my personal preference. Soft but thin AOA Studio Collection Makeup Sponge Set Makeup Blender Latex Free and High-definition Set of 5 Makeup Blender For Powder Cream and Liquid, Super Soft Wonder Blender Beauty Cosmetic Beveled AOA STUDIO {'Brand': 'AOA STUDIO', 'Color': 'Ivory', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '6.85 x 5.39 x 1.97 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '850022931338'} These makeup sponges are super soft which makes it great for a flawless makeup application.

The flat side allows me to dab my liquid foundation before evenly applying it over my face. It also allows me to use my foundation more sparingly to avoid being wasteful. But I particularly love the precision tip which enables me to effortlessly contour & blend concealer around my eyes, nose & lip areas.

These AOA Studio Collection Makeup sponges makes applying makeup perfectly easy. Super Soft & Blends well! OxygenCeuticals 360 Eye Perfection Duo, Advanced Anti-Aging Eye Treatment Set, 2 Products, Eye Cream 35ml/18 oz & Eye Gel Serum 15ml/0.5 oz, Visibly Reduce Under-Eye Bags, Puffiness, Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Fine Lines & Crow's Feet, for Women & Men OxygenCeuticals {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Use for': 'Eyes', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Special Ingredients': 'Adenosine, Niacinamide, Hydrolyzed collagen', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.67 x 0.67 x 5.71 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'OCR700000'} This OxygenCeuticals Eye Perfection Duo is the PERFECT COMBINATION! It comes with 1.18fl.oz of Contour Firming Eye Cream and 0.5fl.oz of Age-Defying Eye Serum. It also included sample packets of some of their other products.

I’ve been using it around my eyes as well as my fine “smile” lines around my mouth for about two weeks now. Even though my lines aren’t deeply set or that visible, I still use this as a preventative maintenance.

I haven’t experienced any irritation and It really is fast-absorbing! It’s so lightweight that I’m able to apply my makeup right after using it. It glides on smoothly and leaves those above mentioned areas feeling soothingly hydrated & moisturized. PERFECT Combination for beauty maintenance! AllWell Beauty Masking Kit | Moisturizing Exfoliating Botanical Radiant Face and Body Mask | With Red Maple, Safflower, & Lavender | Made in the USA | Vegan, Cruelty-Free | 3.38 Fl Oz. Jar + Applicator (Self Care Kit) AllWell AllOver {'Brand': 'AllWell AllOver', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '3.38 Ounce', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Dimensions': '5.25 x 4.25 x 4.13 inches; 12.31 Ounces', 'UPC': '850012824275'} The Allwell Beauty Self Care Kit comes beautifully packaged which is suitable for gift giving. It includes the mask, a silicone brush & a super soft headband that my daughter confiscated for her personal use…

The mask has a very thick consistency but it surprisingly glided on smoothly with the silicone brush. It felt cool and soothing initially but I did experience a lil tingling sensation during my 15 min wait time. When it was time to rinsing it off, it had harden so it was dry, flakey and quite messy. However, my skin in that small test area did feel softer & more moisturized.

With that said, it effectively works to hydrate & soften my skin. But just be mindful that it is as messy as it looks…but it does work marvelously well tho. Marvelous “Messy” Mask Set OGC Cosmetics Hair Mask Anti Frizz 8.5 Fl Oz - 250 Milliliters OGC Cosmetics {'Brand': 'OGC Cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Hair Type': 'Frizzy', 'Product Benefits': 'Frizz Control', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 2.36 x 2.36 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'OGC Cosmetics'} This product works perfectly well to reduce the frizz! It left my hair feeling soft, smooth and moisturized. It also smells great too. It’s lightweight so my hair didn’t feel weighed down or greasy.

Great OGC Anti-Frizz mask that works as described! Goodbye Frizz! Smells & Works GREAT! YouClean 300 Antibacterial Travel Hand Soap Sheets - Pocket/Purse/Wallet/Backpack -Great for Outdoor Camping or Daily Use (Tea Party) (Tea Party) YouClean ['Brand:', 'YouClean', 'Item Form:', 'Sheet', 'Formulation:', 'Concentrated plant-based soap', 'Scent:', 'Tea Party (Chamomile, Green Tea, Tea Tree)', 'Package Box Size:', '2 x 1 x 1.5 inch', 'www.shopyouclean.com', "We are changing our packaging. No more small plastic cases! Our new packaging is 100% biodegradable paper. All 300 sheets are tightly packed in 3 tiny paper boxes (100 sheets/box) which nicely fit in any purse/wallet, handbag, and kids' pack-backs. Check out our 9 scent collections: - Tea Party - Citrus Collection - Purple Heart - Pink Pamper - Red Passion - Blanca Elegance - Seaside Vacation - The Adventure - The Nonsense (unscented)"] {'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'YouClean', 'Scent': 'Tea Party', 'Material Type Free': 'Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil)Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil) See more', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1 x 1.25 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '609670421100', 'Manufacturer': 'YouClean'} Now it definitely doesn’t get any more convenient than these handy YOUCLEAN Antibacterial Foaming Paper Hand Soap Sheets!

Each compact case holds 50 sheets which can be used while on the go with water! This set should have included 8pks, consisting of 400 sheets total. However, I only received 4 packs which consisted of just 200 sheets total.

Nevertheless, with the addition of water these sheets dissolve into hypoallergenic soap that actually lathers quite well. They’re mildly scented, compact, handy and they work to ensure “YOUCLEAN!” Conveniently Handy MRTREUP Elastic Bands For Wig 3Pcs Lace Melting Band Edge Band For Lace Front Wig, Hair Edge Wrap To Lay Edges , Edge Brush For Baby Hair Adjustable Wig Band Rail Tail Comb For Braided(Silver) MRTREUP {'Color': 'Silver', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Baby', 'Material': 'Latex', 'Fabric Type': 'lace', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 1.3 x 2 inches; 1.76 Ounces'} These elastic bands are stretchy, comfy and stylish! I can definitely rock one of these elastic bands as a headband with all the bling and the comfortable elasticity. But my primary use for the bands are to lay & slay my edges! Also, the edge brush & rat tail comb are essential to parting & molding my baby hairs as well. This wig band set is a great addition to my hair styling tools. “SLAY” Bands!
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Hair Type Preference:** Prefers straight styles, particularly human hair. Demonstrates interest in effective frizz-reducing products, as seen in recent engagement with a hair mask.
- **Density Concern:** Values adequate hair density, finding thinner options unsatisfactory.
- **Quality Indicators:** Seeks soft, tangle-free, and well-constructed products; appreciates lightweight formulations that enhance hair texture without weighing it down.
- **Design Appeal:** Enjoys modern aesthetics and prefers pre-plucked hairlines.
- **Fit Requirement:** Needs a specific fit for styles, indicated by a head circumference of less than 22 inches.
- **Experience with Brands:** Engages with quality-focused brands, resulting in mixed reviews over time.
- **Critical Reviewing:** Known for providing detailed, constructive feedback on product performance and quality.
- **Makeup Product Engagement:** Recently purchased high-quality beauty tools, emphasizing softness and precision.
- **Skincare Interest:** Engaged with advanced anti-aging treatments and lightweight moisturizing masks, focusing on irritation-free formulations.
- **Self-Care Focus:** Values beautifully packaged products that balance convenience and effectiveness; enjoys sensory experiences in beauty routines.
- **Personal Care Product Engagement:** Explored compact, eco-friendly personal care options, reflecting a preference for convenience and hypoallergenic quality.
- **Hair Styling Tools:** Recently expanded hair styling toolkit with functional, stylish accessories, enhancing routine effectiveness while maintaining aesthetic appeal.

Overall, the user exhibits a discerning approach toward quality in beauty and self-care products, emphasizing effectiveness and innovative design.
